name: Water Rings
description:
This game will relive your childhood memories and send you back into a state of nostalgia. This is an extremely entertaining game. Here the player needs to put the rings into the hanger, with maximum success. The player can also set the background for the Hanger. This is a time-based game and in 30 seconds, you need to put all the rings into the hanger.

The user has to go through all the hurdles to win the game in the stipulated time. The game has marvelous visual as well as sound effects.

Water Rings is full of excitement and enthusiasm, which will make the Player play the game again and again. So, download the app and get started!
